text: @SenKamalaHarris @H_Combs In the ongoing horror of this pandemic, I think it's important to remember that back in March, the Trump administration offered German scientists a billion dollars for exclusive rights to a coronavirus vaccine which was to be used "only for the USA." Absolutely monstrous.
